author: Jaime Añon
description: “Victoria Indomable is inspired by Facundo Bacardí’s untameable history and legacy. The BACARDÍ rum and Seville orange marmalade and represent the difficulties the Bacardi family went through. Lime freshness portrays Facundo's brilliance, making history with his rum-making techniques and the chocolate bitters offer some sweet moments. Finally – the cigar syrup celebrates the successes of Facundo’s life!”
name: Victoria Indomable

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass
